member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleFactory.CreateContentDecryptionModuleAccess
member.summary: Creates an instance of the interface.
member.param: An LPWSTR identifying the Key System for which the interface is created.
An object containing the configuration options for the CDM.
A DWORD specifying the number of properties in the configurations parameter.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleFactory.IsTypeSupported
member.summary: Queries whether the specified Key System and, optionally, content type are supported.
member.param: An LPCWSTR specifying the Key System for which support is being queried.
Optional. An LPCWSTR specifying the content type for which support is being queried.
member.returns: True if the specified Key System and content type are supported; otherwise, false.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleFactory
member.summary: A factory interface for creating objects.
